sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya butuh membeli tempat tidur ganda untuk kamar tidur saya.
english translation: "I need to buy a double bed for my bedroom."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anak saya memiliki tempat tidur tunggal yang nyaman.
english translation: "My child has a comfortable single bed."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dokter mengatakan saya harus memakai pelindung tempurung lutut saat berolahraga.
english translation: "The doctor said I have to wear a knee cap protector while exercising."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Perusahaan itu memiliki banyak tenaga kerja yang terlatih.
english translation: "The company has a lot of trained workforce."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya harus tetap tenang menghadapi situasi sulit.
english translation: "I have to stay calm in difficult situations."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Olahraga berlebihan dapat menyebabkan cedera pada tendon Achilles.
english translation: "Excessive exercise can cause injury to the Achilles tendon."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya biasanya makan siang sekitar tengah hari.
english translation: "I usually have lunch around midday."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia sering bekerja hingga tengah malam.
english translation: "He often works until midnight."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya menikmati bermain tenis dengan teman-teman saya.
english translation: "I enjoy playing tennis with my friends."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Keluarga saya sering bermain tenis meja di ruang keluarga.
english translation: "My family often plays table tennis in the living room."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya memakai tensoplas untuk menjaga makanan tetap segar.
english translation: "I use plastic wrap to keep food fresh."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saat liburan, saya suka berjalan-jalan di tepi laut.
english translation: "On vacation, I like to take walks on the seashore."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya membutuhkan tepung untuk membuat kue.
english translation: "I need flour to make a cake."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Lampu di kamar itu sangat terang.
english translation: "The lamp in the room is very bright."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Terima kasih telah membantu saya dengan ini.
english translation: "Thank you for helping me with this."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jangan terlambat datang ke acara itu.
english translation: "Don't be late for the event."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya harus pergi ke terminal untuk menaiki bus.
english translation: "I have to go to the bus terminal."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya membutuhkan termometer untuk mengukur suhu tubuh saya.
english translation: "I need a thermometer to measure my body temperature."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya suka membuat semur terong di rumah.
english translation: "I like to make eggplant stew at home."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya sangat tertarik dengan penawaran pekerjaan itu.
english translation: "I am very interested in the job offer."
